pattern.name: pattern
pattern.documentation: Regular expression pattern for proposed instances of String to match.

list_open.name: list_open
list_open.documentation: True if the list is being used to specify the constraint but is not considered exhaustive.

assumed_value.name: assumed_value
assumed_value.documentation: The value to assume if this item is not included in data, due to being part of an optional structure.

valid_value.name: valid_value
valid_value.documentation: True if a_value is valid with respect to constraint expressed in concrete instance of this type.
